explains: v. （使）倾斜，（使）歪斜；有偏向性地陈述，带偏向性地报道
n. 倾斜，歪斜；（有倾向性的）观点，态度
wordGroup: slant range 倾斜范围（等于slant distance）

sentences.en: You slant the pen with an angle of 30 degrees on the paper when you're writing.
sentences.cn: 你书写的时候笔身是倾斜的，和纸张形成30度的倾角。

sentences.en: Each book, paper, or presentation that presents a set of patterns introduces the pattern concept with a different slant.
sentences.cn: 那些展示了模式集合的每一本书、论文或展示都使用不同观点介绍了模式概念。

sentences.en: To help generate lift to keep midwater, the top of the tail extends farther back than the bottom, creating a slant along the back edge.
sentences.cn: 为了保持在水中不至于沉底，尾部的顶端比底端向后延伸，沿着后端形成一个斜面，产生提力。
